text: The 2018 Big West Conference Women's Basketball Tournament did take place March 6–10, 2018 at two venues in the Los Angeles area. The first two rounds were scheduled for Titan Gym in Fullerton, California, while the semifinals and championship were held at the Honda Center in Anaheim. Cal State Northridge, the winner of the Big West Tournament did receive the conference's automatic bid to the 2018 NCAA Women's Division I Basketball Tournament.http://www.bigwest.org/sports/wbball/info/champs/ ==Seeds== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Seed !School !Conference !Overall !Tiebreaker |- | 1 | align=left|UC Davis | 14–1 | 24–4 | |- | 2 | align=left| Cal Poly | 10–5 | 16–11 | |- | 3 | align=left| UC Irvine | 9–6 | 15–12 | |- | 4 | align=left| UCSB | 9–7 | 12–16 | |- | 5 | align=left| Cal Northridge | 8–7 | 15–14 | |- | 6 | align=left| UC Riverside | 5–10 | 8–21 | |- | 7 | align=left| Long Beach State | 5–10 | 7–22 | |- | 8 | align=left| Hawaii | 5–10 | 12–16 | |} ==Schedule== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 95%" |- align="center" !Session !Game !Time* !Matchup# !Television !Attendance |- !colspan=6| First round – Wednesday, March 6 |- |rowspan=2|1 |1 |6:00 PM |#5 Cal State Northridge vs. #8 Hawaii |rowspan=2|ESPN3 |rowspan=2|427 |- |2 |8:30 PM |#6 UC Riverside vs. #7 Long Beach State |- !colspan=7| Quarterfinals – Thursday, March 7 |- |rowspan=2|2 |3 |6:00 PM |#3 UC Irvine vs. #6 UC Riverside |rowspan=2|ESPN3 |rowspan=2|502 |- |4 |8:30 PM |#4 UC Santa Barbara vs. #5 Cal State Northridge |- !colspan=6| Semifinals – Friday, March 9 |- |rowspan=2|3 |5 |12:00 PM |#1 UC Davis vs. #6 UC Riverside |rowspan=2|ESPN3 |rowspan=2|867 |- |6 |2:30 PM |#2 Cal Poly vs. #5 Cal State Northridge |- !colspan=6| Championship Game – Saturday, March 10 |- |4 |7 |4:00 PM |#1 UC Davis vs. #5 Cal State Northridge |Prime Ticket |1,273 |- |colspan=6| *Game Times in PT. #-Rankings denote tournament seeding. |} ==Bracket== ==See also== * 2018 Big West Conference Men's Basketball Tournament ==References== ==External links== *2018 Big West Women's Basketball Championship Category:Big West Conference Women's Basketball Tournament Category:2017–18 Big West Conference women's basketball season
